articles.author: Simone McCarthy
articles.title: Chinese ambassador sparks European outrage over suggestion former Soviet states don't exist - CNN
articles.description: European countries are demanding answers from Beijing after its top diplomat in Paris questioned the sovereignty of former Soviet republics, in comments that could undermine China's efforts to be seen as a potential mediator between Russia and Ukraine.
